attributes.action: reject the proposed 'ecotown' being planed for development within the national Forest in South Derbyshire near the villages of Linton, Cauldwell, Rosliston and Walton on Trent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal if approved would destroy the natural environment of the area which should be developed as woodland. and replace it with an urban sprawl which would overextend local fasciliies, amenities and services. Instead of being ecofriendly it would bring polution and gridlock to the heart of the national forest.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject the proposed 'ecotown' being planed for development within the national Forest in South Derbyshire near the villages of Linton, Cauldwell, Rosliston and Walton on Trent."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14816.asp

Prime Minister's Office
